oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chattanooga, Tennessee (vicinity). View of Umbrella Rock, Lookout Mountain
Umbrella Rock, Lookout Mountain, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A young man, clad in a suit with hat in hand, stands on top of a rock shelf looking off in the distance to his right.

This location, with its scenic view, also became symbolic of the Union triumph over Confederate soldiers in the Battle of Lookout Mountain. It became a popular place for souvenir photographs even during the war.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865; Stereographs--1860-1870
The Persistence of Memory
